Class QuadSorts

java.lang.Object
QuadSorts
public class QuadSorts extends Object
Class of methods to sort arrays in order of least to greatest

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    QuadSorts()
     

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static int[]
    bubbleSort(int[] arr)
    sorts an array from least to greatest by comparing each value in the array to every other value in the array
    static int[]
    insertionSort(int[] arr)
    Sorts an array by running through an array finding the lowest number and inserting it in its correct place
    static int[]
    merge(int[] arr, int[] leftArr, int[] rightArr)
    re-merges the array from mergeSort method from least to greatest
    static int[]
    mergeSort(int[] arr)
    sorts an array of integers by separating the array into many length 1 arrays and recombining them in order from least to greatest
    static int[]
    selectionSort(int[] arr)
    sorts an int array from least to greatest by selecting the smallest value from the unsorted portion of the list, and then sorting it in the previously sorted section

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Method Details

    • bubbleSort

      public static int[] bubbleSort(int[] arr)
      sorts an array from least to greatest by comparing each value in the array to every other value in the array
      Parameters:
      arr - takes the array to be sorted
      Returns:
      returns array sorted from least to greatest

    • selectionSort

      public static int[] selectionSort(int[] arr)
      sorts an int array from least to greatest by selecting the smallest value from the unsorted portion of the list, and then sorting it in the previously sorted section
      Parameters:
      arr - takes the array to be sorted
      Returns:
      returns array sorted from least to greatest

    • insertionSort

      public static int[] insertionSort(int[] arr)
      Sorts an array by running through an array finding the lowest number and inserting it in its correct place
      Parameters:
      arr - Array that we change into tempArr and then sort
      Returns:
      returns tempArr which is sorted least to greatest

    • mergeSort

      public static int[] mergeSort(int[] arr)
      sorts an array of integers by separating the array into many length 1 arrays and recombining them in order from least to greatest
      Parameters:
      arr - takes the array to be sorted
      Returns:
      returns array sorted from least to greatest

    • merge

      public static int[] merge(int[] arr, int[] leftArr, int[] rightArr)
      re-merges the array from mergeSort method from least to greatest
      Parameters:
      arr - takes the array to be sorted
      leftArr - takes the sorted left part of array
      rightArr - takes sorted right part of array
      Returns:
      returns sorted array combined from least to greatest
